body_html: Yes, it's true that my test-case itself demonstrates that there is a work around, by adding in an additional 'dummy' size-1 dimension. So, then it becomes not 'theres no way to get good performance in this situation', but simply 'its easy to accidentally get bad performance, but there are tricks to fix this'.

body: Yes, it's true that my test-case itself demonstrates that there is a work around, by adding in an additional 'dummy' size-1 dimension.  So, then it becomes not 'theres no way to get good performance in this situation', but simply 'its easy to accidentally get bad performance, but there are tricks to fix this'.
